memories.name: main_memory
memories.description: Long-term memory for persistent information storage

metadata.description: Registry of all available memory instances for the LLM Framework
metadata.note: This file tracks which memory instances are available and their enabled/disabled status. The LLM will have full control of enabled memory instances.

configuration_notes.enabled: Set to true to give the LLM access to this memory instance, false to disable
configuration_notes.directory: Directory path where memory files are stored (relative to memory/)
configuration_notes.type: Type of memory: persistent, session, temporary
configuration_notes.metadata.storage_type: Storage format for memory data (json, sqlite, etc.)
configuration_notes.metadata.max_entries: Maximum number of entries allowed in this memory instance

usage_instructions.enabling_memory: Set 'enabled: true' to allow LLM to access and modify memory
usage_instructions.managing_memory: Use 'llf memory' commands to list, enable, disable, and view memory info
usage_instructions.creating_memory: Add new memory instances to the 'memories' array

changes: v1.0: Initial schema with memory management structure
